author: aterrell
title: Chelsea boss Antonio Conte admits he DID have a row with Diego Costa last month but he has smoothed it over with the striker now
text:
EFL SETTING THE TONIO Chelsea boss Antonio Conte admits he DID have a row with Diego Costa last month but he has smoothed it over with the striker now 
Italian claims the striker had problems with his fitness and he had to raise his voice with the Spain international By ALEX TERRELL
